cast.original_title: るろうに剣心 京都大火編
cast.overview: Kenshin has settled into his new life with Kaoru and his other friends when he is approached with a request from the Meiji government. Makoto Shishio, a former assassin like Kenshin, was betrayed, set on fire and left for dead. He survived, and is now in Kyoto, plotting with his gathered warriors to overthrow the new government. Against Kaoru's wishes, Kenshin reluctantly agrees to go to Kyoto and help keep his country from falling back into civil war.
cast.title: Rurouni Kenshin Part II: Kyoto Inferno

cast.original_title: るろうに剣心　伝説の最期編
cast.overview: Shishio sets sail in his ironclad ship to bring down the government. In order to stop him, Kenshin trains with his old master to learn his final technique.
cast.title: Rurouni Kenshin Part III: The Legend Ends

details.biography: Mantarō Koichi (小市 慢太郎 , Koichi Mantarō), born on February 15, 1969 in Osaka, is a Japanese actor. He occasionally does voice work for anime and TV dramas. He's affiliated with Gekidan M.O.P., an agency that mostly assigns work for live action movies and TV series. His bloodtype is B.
details.name: Mantaro Koichi
